main event: A bluish spherical light was observed moving rapidly across the sky for about 3 seconds on January 29, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as a luminous yellowish-white light,Size was noted as small at arm's length,The sighting lasted for about 3 seconds and the object was moving at tremendous speed,The object was believed to be not a meteor due to its speed and motion,The conclusion noted probability of it being an astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: observed by two Airmen in the air Traffic Control Tower
